name: Living Beans
description:
Living Beans is a strategy game made in Unity, help the Bean race to restore their society in a new planet, using their natural resources to one day be able to return to their home planet. Remember that every care is necessary, as a small carelessness can become fatal for the balance of this new ecosystem.

Living Beans was develop during a year as a undergraduate thesis, by a team of 9 developers, from Universidade Anhembi Morumbi at São Paulo, Brazil.
